description: Tree work in Cons.Area - within verge along Hopping Lane 3 limes 2 acacia 1 plane - pruning.1 Sycamore - felling. Works: a) Lime nearest to house: Lift to 20'.Cut back from roof. Reduce height by 25% deadwood & balance crown b) Lime 2nd from house:lift 10' over wall.Reduce crown by 30% treat wound deadwood. c) Lime 3rd from house:lift to the fork.Reduce overhanging branches over lane.Reduce height & spread by up to 30%.Deadwood & balance. d)Plane Remove branch over laburnum and the opposite branch over the wall. Lift and cut back 2 horizontal branches in garden area.Reduce height & spread by up to 30%.Thin and deadwood & balance. e) Large Acacia:Cut back branch over pavement flush to trunk.Reduce & thin rest of crown by 20%. f) Small Acacia:Reduce 1 branch over roadway and another branch over roof corner deadwood & balance crown g) Sycamore: fell to ground level and poison.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
